pullrequest.title: Allow FileWatcher to use hash for specified file types

content.raw:
This sounds great! Sorry it took me so long to get around to looking at the PR.

Has this been in use anywhere? I'm happy to merge if you're satisfied with the level of risk, however much it's been tested.

I'll bump the version post-merge.
